content.question:
Heritage Image Partnership Ltd / Alamy Stock Photo

In the work shown, which of the following fabrication methods contributes to the content and resulting function of the piece?

choices.label: Interlacing horizontal and vertical sticks at regular intervals to create a strong fishing basket
Mapping the location of inland drinking water sources through the careful placement of small cowrie shells
Lashing together sticks with flexible fiber to allow for repositioning of lines in a decorative grid
Placing curved sticks to represent ocean wave swells on a navigational training chart

content.answer: Placing curved sticks to represent ocean wave swells on a navigational training chart

topic.text: 9.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art) beyond the image set, including-  a. form.  b.  Style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
